thread.title: Kellyanne Conway kneels on sofa as black leaders visit White House | Metro News
thread.title_full: Kellyanne Conway kneels on sofa as black leaders visit White House | Metro News

author: Ashitha Nagesh For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Kellyanne Conway kneels on sofa as black leaders visit White House | Metro News
text:
Ashitha Nagesh for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 28 Feb 2017 7:49 am Not great (Picture: Brendan Smialowski/AFP/Getty Images) 
Donald Trump met with leaders of historically black universities and colleges at the White House on Monday. Distressing footage emerges of mother kicking her baby because she won't stop crying 
The meeting of educational leaders was a big deal â€“ education secretary Betsy DeVos and White House aide Omarosa Manigault both came along for the discussions. 
But, in the end, the focus was on Kellyanne Conway â€“ who was splayed out on the Oval Office sofa during the meeting. 
She was photographed kneeling on the sofa with her shoes on, tapping into her phone. Sheâ€™s sitting extremely casually (Picture: AP/Pablo Martinez Monsivais) 
Meanwhile, the guests looked unimpressed. 
Conway, a senior adviser to Trump, was taking photos of the President on her phone at the time â€“ occasionally launching herself forward to get a shot. Not the best way to sit (Picture: Brendan Smialowski/AFP/Getty Images) 
But for most people, her extremely casual position â€“ with her shoes on the sofa and legs apart â€“ was the ultimate show of disrespect. 
@ AFP ...she hatching an egg ? â€” They ALL lookin around like 
"S â€¦. she just gon sit there with her feet up?!?! 
Who RAISED her?!?!?" pic.twitter.com/kzZXoLF0j3
